name: mdos-web
description: The frontend of MDoS exposed to the world - includes user, rights and access management

scripts.dev: nodemon . & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.install: npm run build && export NODE_ENV=production && pm2 start main.js --log /var/log/mdos-web/production --name mdos && pm2 save
scripts.remove: pm2 stop mdos && pm2 delete mdos && pm2 save

author: Michael Ochmann <miko@maschinendeck.org>
